plot: The series follows four half-human operatives who work in secret and live amongst us as undercover agents. Although the world is unaware of them, they are responsible for protecting the human race on a global-scale.
plot_en: The series follows four half-human operatives who work in secret and live amongst us as undercover agents. Although the world is unaware of them, they are responsible for protecting the human race on a global-scale.
plot_es: The series follows four half-human operatives who work in secret and live amongst us as undercover agents. Although the world is unaware of them, they are responsible for protecting the human race on a global-scale.
title: Soldiers of the Apocalypse
